summary: One early morning deputy Philippe Dubaye wakes up his old friend Xavier Maréchal with disturbing news: he has just killed Serrano, a racketeer with extant political connections. Serrano ... See full summary »
cast: Alain Delon|Ornella Muti|Stéphane Audran|Mireille Darc|Maurice Ronet|Michel Aumont|Jean Bouise|Daniel Ceccaldi|Julien Guiomar|Klaus Kinski|François Chaumette|Xavier Depraz|Henri Virlojeux|Colette Duval|Carole Lange|El Kebir|Gérard Hérold|Charles Moulin|Roger Muni|Claude Barichasse|Émile Riandreys|Jean Berger|Philippe Castelli|Sylvestre Warnia de Zarzecki|Jean-Paul Denizon|Arlette Emmery|Maud Hacquard|Armel Issartel|Catherine Lachens|Patrick Laplace|Dominique Messali|Charles Millot|Jacques Pisias|Michel Ruhl|Yvan Tanguy
title: Muerte de un corrupto
